[main:addi r1,r0,10, addi r2,r0,15, add r4,r0,r1, jal init_array, add r4,r0,r1, jal sum_array, j exit, init_array:addi r3,r0,1, init_loop:sw r3,0(r2), addi r3,r3,1, addi r4,r4,1, bge r2,r3,init_loop, jr r7, sum_array:addi r3,r0,1, add r5,r0,r0, sum_loop:lw r6,0(r4), add r5,r5,r6, addi r3,r3,1, addi r4,r4,1, bge r2,r3,sum_loop, jr r7, exit:j exit]
